titles.title: A bill to prescribe zoning authority with respect to commercial unmanned aircraft systems and to preserve State, local, and Tribal authorities and private property with respect to unmanned aircraft systems, and for other purposes.
Drone Integration and Zoning Act of 2019
Drone Integration and Zoning Act of 2019
Drone Integration and Zoning Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
